text: During the 2008–09 season, the Indonesian football club Persib Bandung was placed third in the Indonesia Super League. The team reached the third round of the Indonesian Cup. ==Players== ===Squad information=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left; font-size:90%" width=100% |- ! style="background:#0000FF;
